QuestData.Title: They're Doing it Wrong
QuestData.Description: These demon portals are terrible and sloppy. No skill or finesse in it.$B$bThis physically hurts me and I haven't felt real pain in decades.$b$bI "fixed" some of the Legion's precious Portal Stabilizer crystals.$b$BI want you to take them and "modify" their main portal in the Ingress and watch the "hilarity" ensue.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you see the look on those demons' faces? Priceless!
QuestData.RewardText: If you think the explosion was big on our side of the portal, you should see what the other side looks like. Ha!
